description:
Slick looking road shoes with an aggressive aero profile. A robust, perforated upper lets your feet breathe when you put the hammer down. The glass reinforced midsole offers great power transfer. And heel pads make it easy to walk when you stop for coffee.

  • Synthetic leather upper is easy to clean and breathes well
  • Glass fibre reinforced nylon sole provides stiff pedalling platform
  • Triple hook and loops straps
  • Offset strap design reduces pressure on the top of the foot
  • Durable, wide heel pads
name: Shimano RC100 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
